title: RMPExchangeData (Struct)
text:
TYPE RMPExchangeData : STRUCT
Data structure used to transfer the data in the RMP (Reliable Message Protocoll)

rows.Name: usiLastReceivedCounter
rows.Comment:
Bit0-6: acknowledgement mechanism: tells remote MH, which message (usiMessageSendCounter) was received as last
Bit7: toggle bit (mirror of usiMessageSendCounter.7)

rows.Name: tValidity
rows.Comment: Validity of this message in ms

rows.Name: usiMessageSendCounter
rows.Comment:
Bit0-6: counter that is increased with each sent message (Bit0-6)
Bit7: toggle-bit to check connection
